forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 7C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High around 45F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 2C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 36F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. The rain will be heavy at times. High 8C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 25 to 50mm of rain expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. The rain will be heavy at times. High 47F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 1 to 2 inches of rain expected.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 8C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 25 to 50mm of rain expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 47F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 1 to 2 inches of rain expected.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 9C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 48F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over one inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 6C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 43F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 8C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 46F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 7C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low near 45F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 9C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 48F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 3C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall may reach 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 38F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High near 5C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High near 40F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow. Low 1C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow. Low 34F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 70%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 4C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 39F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming a steady light rain late. Low -1C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low 31F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow. High 3C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow. High 37F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional snow showers. Low -2C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 50%. 2-3cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Variably cloudy with snow showers. Low 28F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 50%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow in the morning. Rain and snow will become intermittent in the afternoon. High 2C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow in the morning will become intermittent in the afternoon. High around 35F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow in the evening transitioning to snow showers late. Low -3C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 50%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow in the evening transitioning to snow showers late. Low 26F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 50%. About one inch of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow in the morning. A shower or two in the afternoon - otherwise, mostly cloudy. High 2C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow in the morning. A shower or two in the afternoon - otherwise, mostly cloudy. High 36F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 50%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy. Snow showers around after midnight. Low -4C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy. Snow showers around after midnight. Low around 25F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 50%.
